roleset.name: applaud/give accolades to
roleset.note: RECOGNIZE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls consider-29.9-1-1, conjecture-29.5-1. Updated by Julia, 2/2011. (from recognize.01-v)
RECOGNITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on recognize-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls judgement-33. (from recognition.01-n)

roles.note: predication and cause each given their own arg here. (from recognition.01-n)

example.name: almost all args
example.text: I was pleased to note that your Oct. 23 Centennial Journal item recognized the money-fund concept as one of the significant events of the past century.
example.arg: as one of the significant events of the past century

example.name: recognize for
example.text: At the press conference, John formally recognized Mary for her excellent marksmanship

example.name: adj arg0
example.text: He gained national recognition as a segregationist .

example.name: MNR and oblique arg0
example.text: Meanwhile , in the South Pacific , there were gains and losses , with the ROC losing its formal ties with Tonga but gaining formal recognition from the Marshall Islands .

example.name: arg2
example.text: If anything it is his friends who are happiest , relieved to see Hsia gaining deserved recognition for the achievements of his peripatetic , ill - starred life .
example.arg: for the achievements of his peripatetic, ill-starred life

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: She holds regular seminars for new immigrants , and was recently awarded the Queen 's Service Medal in recognition of her dedication

example.name: most args
example.text: Being an ardent fan of football, this is my small recognition of them for winning the last three consecutive National Football League.
example.arg: for winning the last three consecutive National Football Leauge

example.name: recognition as-- arg3
example.text: His enthusiastic teaching of freshman seminars also led to his recognition as the "Kappa Kappa Gamma Professor of the Year, 2009."
example.arg: as the "Kappa Kappa Gamma Professor of the Year, 2009"

roleset.name: acknowledge as true/familiar
roleset.note: RECOGNIZE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1, sight-30.2, consider-29.9-1-1. (from recognize.02-v)
RECOGNITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on recognize-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls conjecture-29.5-1, sight-30.2, consider-29.9-1-1. (from recognition.02-n)

example.name: the public good
example.text: Decisions by the Second Circuit itself, Judge Oakes continued, had recognized that public interest in the subject matter and the indispensability in particular cases of verbatim quotations are vital components of fair use.
example.arg: Decisions by the Second Circuit itself
that public interest in the subject matter and the indispensability in particular cases of verbatim quotations are vital components of fair use.

example.name: acknowledge as true
example.text: In the least , we must recognize the futility of trying to use exchange - rate intervention to offset the effects of tax - rate reduction on capital flows .
example.arg: the futility of trying to use exchange - rate intervention to offset the effects of tax - rate reduction on capital flows

example.name: arg1
example.text: He should do more to reduce tax rates on wealth and income , inrecognition of the fact that those cuts yield higher , not lower, revenues .
example.arg: of the fact that those cuts yield higher , not lower , revenues

example.name: another arg1
example.text: a recognition that there was much too much fluff in the LBOmarket
example.arg: that there was much too much fluff in the LBO market

example.name: internal arg1
example.text: but when you link this simple product together with a trademark , powerful name recognition , and high quality control , the result has swept the globe .

example.name: both args
example.text: ... the Standing Committee of the 8th NPC formally passed the " Laws of the PRC Red Cross Society " , reflecting the state 's high - level recognition and support of the humanitarian cause of the Red Cross .
example.arg: of the humanitarian cause of the Red Cross

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John recognized prom as his last chance to dump a bucket of hog blood on Mary's head.
example.arg: as his last chance to dump a bucket of hog blood on Mary's head.
